title: Jovian Careers Website
description: A Job Offerings application for Jovian using Flask, with MySQL on Aiven. This app streamlines the job application process, making it easier for job seekers to find and apply for positions, and for companies to manage applications efficiently. By integrating email notifications and hCaptcha for security, it ensures a smooth and secure experience.

title: IOT Asset Tracking
description: This project is a web application designed to monitor and manage IoT inventory. It provides real-time insights into the location and status of devices, streamlining asset management processes.

title: RoboFleet Dashboard
description: The RoboFleet Dashboard is a web-based interface designed to monitor and manage fleets of ROS-enabled service-mobile robots. It provides real-time insights into robot performance, status, and task execution, facilitating efficient fleet management.

title: ROS Log Viewer
description: The ROS Log Viewer is a web application that allows users to view and analyze ROS log files. It provides a user-friendly interface for filtering and searching logs, making it easier to diagnose issues and monitor system performance.

title: Map Visualization
description: Creating interactive maps using Python and Streamlit. The project includes visualizations such as global company distributions, American Airlines flight paths, and state-city scatter and choropleth maps. The main application is structured to allow users to select different map types from a sidebar for display.

title: Next Voting Dashboard
description: The Next Voting Dashboard is a web application that allows users to create and participate in polls. It provides real-time results and a user-friendly interface for managing polls and viewing statistics.

title: Dynamic Event Calendar
description: The Dynamic Event Calendar is a web application that allows users to create and manage events. It provides a user-friendly interface for scheduling events, sending invitations, and viewing event details.

title: Next Dashboard
description: The Next Dashboard is a web application that provides a customizable interface for managing various tasks and data. It integrates with multiple APIs to provide real-time insights and analytics.

title: Python Tutorials Website
description: A Tutorials application for new learners using Django, with PostgresSQL on Render. This app provides users with basic tutorials to various fields in python programming.

title: GenieTalks Chatbot
description: GenieTalks is a chatbot application that integrates with Google's Generative AI model for intelligent responses. Users can ask questions, receive responses, and view their chat history. The project demonstrates how to use Vite for the frontend and Express.js for the backend, leveraging Google's Generative AI for conversational capabilities.

title: To Do
description: The To Do project is a task management application that helps users organize and prioritize their tasks. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for adding, editing, and completing tasks.

title: NEWS APP
description: The NEWS APP is a web application that aggregates news articles from various sources. It provides a user-friendly interface for browsing and reading news, with options to filter by category and source.
